Title: Not Pitbull-proof
Cons:
Unfortunately, co-workers dog took it off my desk and gnawed into the battery door.  Camera still works fine, but I destroyed the door opening it to charge the battery.

Only real con is that Olympus uses proprietary USB-connectors.  They look identical, but standard USB cords don't work.

There's no apparently good reason for using non-standard connectors when standard ones work fine.  Companies don't do this for the buyer's benefit.
Pros:
Simple to use, compact, and durable.  
Immediately tested by dropping from 5' onto cement floor and it was un-damaged.
Great ergonomics, and photos turned out fine.
Comments:
I almost replaced this with an identical unit, but Newegg had the Tough 630 for sale at only a little higher price.
I'm very happy with that one.
